  • Method Details

    • create

      public UpdatedDebts create(String groupID, String user, float price, String itemID, List<String> usersInPurchase)
      This function will be called from the main/view in order to control the use case updatePaymentBalance which occurs whenever a user from a group purchases an item from the planning list. This controller packages all the required information that the view sends forward into the PaymentDetails data structure, instantiates the presenter, and passes all of this information to call the use case through the input boundary.
      Parameters:
      groupID - String object representing the ID of a group.
      user - User object representing the user who purchased the item.
      price - Float object representing the price of the item purchased.
      itemID - String object representing the ID of the item purchased.
      Returns:
      the information sent back by the presenter through the use case to go to the view layer as an UpdatedDebts object.
